comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Llandrindod Wells, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content:
Thanks for adding this to the group.

Think it is incredible that you can see the hotel from the lake, although the hotel has long gone.  If I can remember sometime I will try and take a photo from the same angle to show how much the trees/shrubs have grown.

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: This is the view in 2010 (I have been waiting until they removed the metal fence that was put up last year while they were dredging the lake)

comment._content: Thanks for the link.  I will bookmark that so that I can keep up to date.
